Package de.affect.gui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AffectMonitor
    The interface AffectMonitor defines all necessary methods that should be provided by a concrete implementation of an AffectMonitor.
    AffectStatusDisplay
    The interface AffectStatus defines all necessary methods that should be provided by a concrete implementation of an affect status display.
    EmotionMaintainerNotifier  
    GroupAffectMonitor
    The interface GroupAffectMonitor defines all necessary methods that should be provided by a concrete implementation of an GroupAffectMonitor.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AffectMonitorFrame
    The AffectMonitorFrame displays all characters' affective status.
    AffectMonitorInternalFrame
    The AffectMonitor displays all characters' affective status.
    AffectMonitorPanel
    The AffectMonitorPanel displays all characters' affective status.
    AffectStatusInternalFrame
    The AffectStatusInternalFrame displays all entity' affective status.
    AffectStatusPanel
    The AffectStatusPanel shows all ongoing changes in the character's affect by text comments.
    AlmaAboutDialog
    The class AlmaAboutDialog gives information about the ALMA application.
    AlmaConfigInternalFrame  
    AlmaConfigPanel
    The class AlmaConfigPanel provides an graphicsal interfaces for all computing relevant variables This code relys on the xml bean classes created with xmlbeans v1.3 from the Affect.xsd schema, which is part of this distribution.
    AlmaGUI
    The class AlmaGUI gives access to all configuration data of the affect processing and gives access to all characters affective profile
    AlmaInternalFrame
    Common Alma Internal Frame
    CharacterAffectCompPanel
    The CharacterAffectCompPanel provides an graphical interfaces for all computing relevant variables of ALMA affect computing sub modules This code relys on the xml bean classes created with xmlbeans v2.0 from the Affect.xsd schema that is part of this distribution.
    CharacterAppraisalPanel
    ConfigPanel for setting up appraisals.
    CharacterConfigInternalFrame  
    CharacterConfigPanel  
    ConsoleInternalFrame
    The class DesktoConsoleInternalFramepHelper displays all internal (debug) messages as well as information about some internal computation steps.
    DesktopHelper
    The class DesktopHelper keeps track of which windows are displayed.
    EmotionDecayPanel
    Displays a emotion decay function.
    EmotionVectorPanel
    The EmotionVectorPane shows the intensity of an character's emotions with sliders.
    GroupAffectMonitorFrame
    The GroupAffectMonitorFrame displays all groups' affective status.
    GroupAffectMonitorInternalFrame
    The AffectMonitor displays all groups' affective status.
    GroupAffectMonitorPanel
    The GroupAffectMonitorPanel displays all groups' affective status.
    GroupAffectStatusPanel
    The GroupAffectStatusPanel.java shows all ongoing changes in a group's affect by text comments.
    GroupAppraisalPanel
    ConfigPanel for setting up appraisals.
    GroupCharactersPanel
    The group characters panel displays available and used characters of a group.
    GroupConfigInternalFrame  
    GroupCreationDialog
    The group creation dialog which uses the group characters panel for displaying the used characters.
    Helpers  
    HelpInternalFrame  
    InteractionSimulationFrame  
    InteractionSimulationInternalFrame  
    Mood3D
    Extended Canvas3D object for displaying points in the PAD space.
    ParamsInternalFrame
    With the computation parameters internal frame the user can edit all available acts and emotions (which is still todo).
    SImageView
    This class re-implements the JDK class ImageView, which as issues with relative filenames and dynamic content assignment in JEditorPanes.setText() (see Display images using JEditorPane).
